meanings.definition: Very small in size or amount.
meanings.sent1: The ant carried the tiniest crumb back to its nest.
meanings.sent2: The tiniest flower in the garden bloomed beautifully.
meanings.sent3: The tiniest kitten tried to meow but only managed a squeak.
meanings.sent4: Her voice was the tiniest whisper in the noisy room.
meanings.sent5: The tiniest star in the sky twinkled faintly.

meanings.sent1: He found the tiniest pebble on the beach.
meanings.sent2: The tiniest details can make a big difference in a painting.
meanings.sent3: The tiniest slice of cake made him feel like a giant.
meanings.sent4: In the tiniest box, she kept her most precious memories.
meanings.sent5: The tiniest snowflake landed gently on her nose.
